articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Supreme Court dismisses challenge to Affordable Care Act, leaving it in place - CNN
articles.description: The Supreme Court dismissed a challenge to the Affordable Care Act on Thursday in a decision that will leave the law intact and save health care coverage for millions of Americans. The justices turned away a challenge from Republican-led states and the former…

articles.title: Smelling in stereo: The real reason snakes have flicking, forked tongues - Phys.org

articles.title: 1,098-carat diamond pulled from mine in Botswana - CBC.ca
articles.description: A 1,098-carat diamond believed to be the third-largest gem-quality stone ever to be mined has been discovered in Botswana, according to a joint venture between Anglo American's De Beers and the government.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Botswana unearths 'world's third largest diamond' - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: A 1,098 carat diamond believed to be the third largest gem-quality stone ever to be mined, has been discovered in Botswana, according to a joint venture between Anglo American's De Beers and the government.
